title: Large 2BR/1BA Apt - Security Building, Elevator, Dual Pane Windows, ++
posting_body: ["Available is this very large, clean and quiet two-bedroom one-bath apartment located a stone's throw from Carlmont Village Shopping Center.", 'Other area perks are hiking and biking trails, the public library and easy access to Highways 101, 92 and 280.', 'A partial list of features include:', '>Corner unit', '>Quiet apartment', '>Two large bedrooms', '>Spacious Living Room living room', '>View (most units)', '>Balcony', '>Dual-pane windows', '>Granite Counters', '>Dishwasher', '>Disposal', '>Frost-free refrigerator', '>Lots of closet space', '>Cable-ready', '>Covered carport', '>', 'Additional storage', '>Security building', '>Elevator', '>Laundry facilities', '>Swimming pool', '>', 'Convenient location', '>Well-maintained building', '...and much more.', 'Unlike may buildings in the area, we include water, sewer, trash and parking in the rent...No surprises at the end of the month!', 'One year lease.', "Good credit, renter's insurance and security deposit are required.", 'Smoking, pet dogs or cats and barbecues are NOT allowed.', 'This apartment will not last long.', 'For more information on this apartment, please call', 'show contact info', '.', 'Also ask about our other Belmont locations.', 'Thank you for viewing our posting and we look forward to speaking with you soon.']
